fullplot: The life and career of Bret Hart is recounted from his youth, through the start of his career, his years in the WWF, up to the present day. Bret discusses the high and lows of his career and shows the world of professional wrestling from a wrestler's point of view.
plot: Documentary focusing on the career of pro wrestler Bret Hart & his controversial exit from the WWF.
title: Hitman Hart: Wrestling with Shadows
